QuestData.Title: 'Til Death Do Us Part
QuestData.Description:
I don't know who you are, but I need your help.
My precious Valjabu always told me he didn't care dat he took de vows of a priest... we would be together forever.
Well, my time came to pass, and I knew I'd not be able to go on without him. I came back and have been waiting in dis spot for... it seems forever, and Valjabu never showed!
I've been walking around dis world for far too long.
Please, I beg you, bring a memento of my Valjabu back to me!
